6. Finally, we check where this game was played. The row number corresponds to the number of the game, so the 8th game is row 8 (since we are looking for the game before the Detroit Lions match). Looking at row 8, we can see that it says "RCA DOME" in the "Stadium" column, which confirms our hypothesis.
